register.reg_condition: when EL1 is capable of using AArch32

purpose_text.para: Used by software to read the values of the CLAIM tag bits, and to clear CLAIM tag bits to 0.
The architecture does not define any functionality for the CLAIM tag bits.

note.para: CLAIM tags are typically used for communication between the debugger and target software.

purpose_text.para: Used in conjunction with the DBGCLAIMSET register.

configuration_text.para: An implementation must include eight CLAIM tag bits.

field_description.para: Read or clear CLAIM tag bits. Reading this field returns the current value of the CLAIM tag bits.
Writing a 1 to one of these bits clears the corresponding CLAIM tag bit to 0. This is an indirect write to the CLAIM tag bits. A single write operation can clear multiple CLAIM tag bits to 0.
Writing 0 to one of these bits has no effect.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
